overview:
Adrian Nazari is CEO and founder of Credit Sesame.

Previously, he was the founder and CEO of Financial Crossing Inc., an organization consisting of financial industry, technology, and academic experts and advisors dedicated to the development of next generations of â€œLiabilities Managementâ€ and advisory solutions for financial services sector. He pioneered the emerging industry of Liabilities Management and was founder and CEO of FinancialCircuit where he brought first of a kind mortgage and liability management solutions and business processes to the lending and financial advisory market before it was acquired by Linsco Private Ledger in 2004.

Prior to forming FinancialCircuit in 2000, Mr. Nazari served as Vice President of Marketing and Business Development at Savvion, where he positioned the start-up in the emerging business process management (BPM) software and helped the company become the market leader with global enterprise customers in various sectors including financial services companies such as Bank of America, Intuit, Transunion, First American Title, Checkfree, and First Data. Prior to Savvion, Mr. Nazari held various products, marketing, and business management positions at National Semi where he turned new technology and concepts to leading market products and real businesses for both programmable and embedded systems divisions.

Mr. Nazari has a Masters in Business Management from Stanford Graduate School of Business where he was a Sloan fellow.
